title: black brawlers boots disabled
body: thankyou riot for letting us know before we got into game that you disabled the teleport boots. just lost a game because our top laner took ignite because he was going too purchase those boots. rip

replies.body: lmfao, i dont think you lost simply because of the teleport boots. get good scrub.

Hi MooTa,

Sorry to hear about that.  Was this in the Black Market Brawlers mode?

BTW - You can always find the latest info on this kind of thing on our [Service Status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#oce) page.

Cheers
Mindstar
